name: Chahat Kansotiya
position: Student at Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
about: As a current master's student with a strong interest in data science, I am eager to apply my skills and knowledge to a real-world setting. Through my academic coursework & projects, I have gained experience in Scipy, Pandas, matplotlib, and XGboost, using Python in Jupyter Notebook. I am particularly interested in the intersection of data science and how data analysis can drive decision-making and improve outcomes. I am excited to work with a team of experienced data scientists to gain hands-on experience and further develop my skills.

current_company.name: Unravel Data
current_company.title: Student at Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: ‚Ä¢Performed statistical analysis and comprehensive data visualization, establishing a robust foundation for the project.‚Ä¢Conducted thorough EDA, obtained correlation for input features, and preprocessed data by feature selection and encoding.‚Ä¢Ensured data integrity through effective splitting into train, test, and validation, and handled missing values and outliers.‚Ä¢Developed, Hyper-tuned, and evaluated regression and classification models, and selected the optimal model based on results.‚Ä¢Employed XGBoost model to achieve 98% precision and 87% recall for classification and showed results through the dashboard.
experience.description_html: ‚Ä¢Performed statistical analysis and comprehensive data visualization, establishing a robust foundation for the project.‚Ä¢Conducted thorough EDA, obtained correlation for input features, and preprocessed data by feature selection and encoding.‚Ä¢Ensured data integrity through effective splitting into train, test, and validation, and handled missing values and outliers.‚Ä¢Developed, Hyper-tuned, and evaluated regression and classification models, and selected the optimal model based on results.‚Ä¢Employed XGBoost model to achieve 98% precision and 87% recall for classification and showed results through the dashboard.

projects: [{"title":"Analyzing Stock Performance and Building a Dashboard | Coursera","description":"‚Ä¢Extracted historical Share Price &Revenue data using Python libraries and Webscraping on populer stocks.‚Ä¢Extracted data from web using BeautifulSoap, yfinance, Numpy for various stocks.‚Ä¢Visualised the data into a dashboard in form of plots to identify patterns or trends."},{"title":"Classification using MNIST Dataset","description":"‚Ä¢Developed a fully connected feedforward neural network model with various activation functions for digit classification.‚Ä¢Trained the models using the MNIST training dataset, tested the models with the test data, and compared their results."},{"title":"Machine Learning | Spam Classification | Support Vector Machine","description":"‚Ä¢Implemented a spam filter using SVM with a linear kernel, leveraging a dataset comprising 4000 training and 1000 test emails.‚Ä¢Employed Text Analytics methodologies such as Stemming, Normalization, and Feature Extraction to preprocess the data.‚Ä¢Trained the SVM model on the meticulously preprocessed dataset, yielding an impressive test set accuracy of 98.5%."},{"title":"Semi Markov Models for Change Point Detection","description":"‚Ä¢ Formulated the problem of change point detection in a time series using the Semi-Markov Model framework.‚Ä¢ Used EM algorithm to detect the probabilistic model to identify the change point of a time series data."},{"title":"SVM Development for classification using IRIS dataset","description":"‚Ä¢Built distinct support vector machines featuring different kernel functions for species classification on the IRIS dataset.‚Ä¢Trained the SVM models, calculated classification accuracy for test data, and then visualized with comparative analysis."}]
